item.title: Exploring global .NET Core tools
item.description: Pack and ship your .NET Core application and install it as a global tool using .NET Core 2.1.300 preview tooling.

item.title: Use appsettings.json and environment overrides in classic ASP.NET apps
item.description: Supercharge your classic ASP.NET apps with the config system introduced in ASP.NET Core

item.title: Make dotnet test work on solution files
item.description: Using the dotnet test command on solutions containing non-test projects currently erros. Here's a workaround.

item.title: Auto-modifying connection strings based on the environment
item.description: Ease development and ops by configuring only one connection string and use code to modify it based on the current environment.
